context: <a1_1><a1_2><b4_0><b9_0>Engineering News-Record<b4_0/> (ENR)<b9_0/><a1_2/><a1_1/> is <a0_0><a0_1>a <a0_2>trade magazine for the construction industry<a0_2/><a0_1/><a0_0/>. Each year, <a1_0><b5_0>ENR<b5_0/><a1_0/> compiles and reports on <b10_0>data about the size of design and construction companies<b10_0/>. They publish <b11_0>a list of the <b6_0>largest companies<b6_0/> in the United States (Top-40)<b11_0/> and also a list the largest global firms (Top-250, <b7_0>by <b12_0>amount of work they are doing outside their home country<b12_0/><b7_0/>). In <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><b13_0>2014<b13_0/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/>, ENR compiled <b8_0>the data in nine market segments<b8_0/>.
